Supply Chain Solutions

Paxcom eGenie, helps you build a strong supply chain
for omni-channel online selling.

  • Products Listing
  • Auto Distribute Inventory
  • Centralized Orders view
  • Manage returns & cancellations
  • Reconcile accounts
  • Data Insights

List products on multiple Marketplaces

Isn’t the listing process time consuming? What if we say you can do it from one place for all channels?

What we solve for you?
  • Automatic listing of your products on multiple channels from one place.
  • Map your already listed products at one place to assist you with single panel view on Orders, Returns and Accounts.

Auto Distribute Inventory on Multiple Channels

Unless you have a centralized inventory management system for your multipchannel online sales, you can end up either overselling or underselling your products on at the least one of your sales channels. We let you sync your inventory and auto update it across all the marketplaces. You can now expect to have no more penalties on order cancellations or order delays.

What we solve for you?
  • Avoid overselling or underselling by optimally and automatically distributing your inventory on all marketplaces
  • Auto updates of inventory on all channels when order is received from any channel
  • Single place to view inventory status on all channels, no hopping to multiple portals

Get a centralized Orders view for all marketplaces

Centralized panel to manage the orders at one place for all sales channels.

Paxcom integrates with major online marketplaces Flipkart, Amazon, Paytm and Snapdeal. All your orders are fetched to single panel, no need to spend time and labor cost on reviewing seller panel for each.

What we solve for you?
  • Monitor status of orders for your products from popular marketplaces.
  • Notifications to quickly process the orders based on their status.

Manage order returns and cancellations

One challenge with eCommerce is that if number of orders is huge, so is the number of returns. Online returns management also involves matching your inventory and account reconciliation from marketplaces for due payments. We offer a centralized panel to manage the returned orders for all sales channels. Studies suggest that by 2020 E-Commerce in India would have 10%-15% return rate. Are you managing your return efficiently on time??

What we solve for you?
  • View status and information of the return orders created for your products across marketplaces.
  • Track status of disputes
  • Synchronize inventory automatically once you transfer returned stock to good inventory or bad inventory based on the condition of returned item.
  • Insights like impact of returns on business, amount spent on logistics or damages due to returns, etc.

Reconcile accounts for due payments from E-marketplaces

Oh! This for sure is every seller's pain point. Marketplaces always tend to charge you incorrect commissions or logistics cost. We help you automatically reconcile the payble and receivables across multiple marketplaces. We offer account reconciliation for major Indian marketplaces like Flipkart, Amazon, Snapdeal, Paytm.

What we solve for you?
  • Reports on received or pending payments from all channels
  • Reports on errors in received payments
  • Auto calculations of payments, no more manual and error prone calculations on logistics, returns, commissions, etc.
  • Clear numbers on profitability status
  • Raise disputes for products with damaged returns, track and calculate refunds from marketplace seller protection funds

Deep dive into your data to drive growth strategies

Data alone will not be of any value until it says something. Our services will empower you with quick access to key performance indicators of your ecommerce business. From covering basic insights on due orders, SLA breached orders to advanced decision driving analytics on Lost sales because of out of stock products, top reasons for poor ratings, etc.

What we solve for you?
  • Dashboards on critical data
  • Performance indicators on fulfilment, sales and products
  • Data on things that need quick action - Shipments due today, Fast runners that need stock refill, products with maximum returns (you might want to stop selling or dive deep to rectify the issue), etc
  • Brand wise sales reports, best sellers and worst sellers
  • Inventory Status alerts, Slow moving inventory which can be cleared for maintaining cash flow
  • And a lot more.
